definition: The term "billig" refers to something that is economically priced or inexpensive. It is commonly used to describe products or services that are affordable or available at a low cost.

examples.german: Ich habe ein billiges Auto gekauft.
Die Preise sind hier sehr billig.
examples.english: The prices are very low here.

examples.german: Das Essen in diesem Restaurant ist billig.
examples.english: The food in this restaurant is inexpensive.
